titleStmt.title: The believers duty towards the Spirit, and the Spirits office towards believers, or, A discourse concerning believers not grieving the Spirit, and the Spirits sealing up believers to the day of redemption grounded on Ephes. 4. 30.
titleStmt.author: Hickman, Henry, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
